name: Rosie Schaap's Cuba Libre
description: Real cane cola makes a difference in this classic highball. Try to find Mexican Coca-Cola or Boylan sugar cane cola if you can.
recipeIngredient: Cola (preferably cane cola, such as Mexican Coca-Cola or Boylan), to fill
Squeeze of lime, plus a lime wedge for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a highball glass with ice and add rum, cola to fill and squeeze of lime. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

video.name: Cuba Libre
video.description: How to make this classic highball. Use real cane cola if you can find it.
